item.title: DPDK Introduction
item.guests: Harry van Haaren and Dave Hunt from Intel

description.p: Dave and Harry are developers who work at Intel on DPDK, the Data Plane Development Kit, which is a library for high-performance packet processing in userspace. This episode is an introduction to DPDK, its history, status, and its future, and how it relates to Open vSwitch and the DPDK datapath included in Open vSwitch.

OVS Orbit is produced by Ben Pfaff. The intro music in this episode is Drive, featuring cdk and DarrylJ, copyright 2013, 2016 by Alex. The bumper music is Yeah Ant featuring Wired Ant and Javolenus, copyright 2013 by Speck. The outro music is Space Bazooka featuring Doxen Zsigmond, copyright 2013 by Kirkoid.
